title: What are some of the best possible universities in Malaysia? - Quora

response.answer_text: Updated as of 3th October 2018 There are various ranking indicators such as Quacquarelli Symonds (QS) Ranking, Times Higher Education (THE) Ranking, Academic Ranking of World Universities (ARWU) Ranking, etc, which is to evalutate performance of universities around the world. Due to there are many rankings indicators, only top 5 Malaysia universities will be showed for each ranking indicator below: QS World University Rankings 2019 University of Malaya - 87thUniversiti Kebangsaan Malaysia - 184thUniversiti Putra Malaysia - 202ndUniversiti Sains Malaysia - 207thUniversiti Teknologi Malaysia - 228thQS Asian University Rankings 2018 University of Malaya - 24thUniversiti Putra Malaysia - 36thUniversiti Kebangsaan Malaysia - 43thUniversiti Sains Malaysia - 46thUniversiti Teknologi Malaysia - 49thTimes Higher Education World University Rankings 2019 University of Malaya - 301–350thUniversiti Tunku Abdul Rahman - 501–600thUniversiti Kebangsaan Malaysia - 601–800thUniversiti Sains Malaysia - 601–800thUniversiti Teknologi Malaysia - 601–800thTimes Higher Education Asia University Rankings 2018 University of Malaya - 46thUniversiti Tunku Abdul Rahman - 99thUniversiti Teknologi Petronas - 114thUniversiti Teknologi Malaysia - 129thUniversiti Putra Malaysia - 142ndAcademic Ranking of World Universities 2018 University of Malaya - 301–400thUniversiti Sains Malaysia - 401–500thUniversiti Kebangsaan Malaysia - 501–600thUniversiti Putra Malaysia - 601–700thUniversiti Teknologi Malaysia - 801–900thFor complete list of ranking of universities in Malaysia, kindly refer to: Rankings of universities in Malaysia - Wikipedia Hope this info helps those who is currently dilemma in choosing right university to study in Malaysia.

Not sure which one is best but you can see the ranking either here by a local newspaper or by Times Higher Education (THE). We have several Public Universities in here and a lot of Private Colleges and/or Universities. Below shows the ranking of Malaysian Public University.  University of Malaya (UM) was in top 100 university worldwide a few years back. Anyway, It actually depends on your field of study. If you are into science, medical, your choice would range on UM, UKM and USM. Engineering, computer science, would be in UTM, Universiti Teknologi Petronas (UTP). Islamic studies, IIUM. Accounting, management, business studies, UUM. Please be noted that this is just a very rough and little information given. A lot more detailed research on these universities and others as well is needed in order to know more. I may be wrong or slightly incorrect in informing above paragraph to you. But I guess now, you know where to start and what keyword should be googled, right? Not to mention try to contact certified counsellors in your home country too to know more about this, or you can also directly contact the universities you’d like to know more about. All the best.
